Summary: bright blue light then solid red light that periodicaly strobed
divs: Sighting DetailsAprox. 8:00 pm i went into back yard to call in dog when i wittnessed a stationary blue cigar shaped object. then myself and 2 others watched over the next 45 min. to an hour the object switch from bright neon blue to a solid bright red while moving vertically and horizontaly quickly and without any straight lines. the final action we wittnessed was it shoot straight up and then dive straight down very fast blue in color at aprox.8:45 or 9:00pm. always a believer but never thought i would wittness anything of this nature in my lifetime!
